chunk:
Aika Wellness Fruit Enzyme Face Mask

Brand: Aika Wellness

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Mel (Honey), Glycerin (Plant Glycerin), Solanum tuberosum (Potato), Punica granatum (Pomegranate), Lycospersicon esculentum (Tomato), Curcubita Pepo (Pumpkin), Malus pumila (Apple), Fragaria chiloensis (Strawberry), Prunus persica (Peach), Rubus idaeus (Raspber

ubus idaeus (Raspberry), Althea officinalis (Marshmallow), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe vera), Carica Papaya (Papaya), Emblica officinalis (Amla), Citrus limonum (Lemon), Citrus aurantium var.bergamia (Bergamot), Citrus sinensis (Sweet orange), Citrus paradise (Grapefruit), Citrus aurantiifolia (Lime).

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxici
rgies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
